about_the_game:
This walkthrough DLC will add hints to all the important choices in the game so that you won't miss any interesting content in the game!

PDF file with deep explanation of how to get to every ending is also included in game folder.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. The characters depicted in the game are 18 years old of age or older. 

Includes explicit sexual content and behavior some viewers may find offensive or disturbing. Characters engage in oral, vaginal, and anal sex acts, as well as non-penetrative sexual acts. There are scenes of sexual intercourse with pregnant characters. Bondage, sexual domination and submission, pet play, the use of sex toys, bodily fluids, urination, and alternative sexual lifestyles are portrayed.

Strong language is frequently used throughout. Mature themes, such as blackmailing, drugs, and non-consensual sex, are mentioned. The game contains use of alcohol and tobacco. 

The story, characters, names, and actions are fictitious, and any similarity to real life is coincidental and unintended.
